project_descr: Building on the understanding and successes of the previous two phases, the third phase of the project (2014-2015) will focus on addressing the new challenges to civil peace and peace building in the country posed by the Syrian crisis.

outputs.output_descr: The project will focus on addressing the new challenges to civil peace and peace building posed by the Syrian crisis. The focus is on education, media, local level peace building and an MGO platform promoting nation-wide truth and reconciliation.
donor_name: US Department of State, Office to monitor & combat Tracking in persons.
